content.query:
let minPeriod = 5m;
let numPeriods = 24;
let startTime = {timeRange:start};
let endTime = {timeRange:end};
let timeBin_ = (endTime - startTime) / numPeriods;
let timeBin = iff(timeBin_ < minPeriod, minPeriod, timeBin_);
let set1 = promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s == "edgehub_message_size_bytes_sum"
| extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags_s)
| extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
| extend id = trim_start(@"[^/]+/", tostring(dimensions.id))
| extend value = toint(Value_s)
| extend id_device = strcat(id,"+",device) 
| project id, device, id_device, value, TimeGeneratedUtc_t
| order by id_device, TimeGeneratedUtc_t
| serialize | extend nextValue = next(value, 1) | extend nextId = next(id_device, 1)
| extend diff = iff((value - nextValue) >= 0, value - nextValue, value)
| where id_device == nextId and diff >= 0
| make-series Trend = sum(diff) on TimeGeneratedUtc_t from startTime to endTime step timeBin by id_device, id, device
| project-away TimeGeneratedUtc_t;
let set2 = set1
| join kind=inner (set1
    | extend TrendTotal = Trend
    | mvexpand TrendTotal
    | summarize totalBytes = sum(toint(TrendTotal)) by id_device, id, device
    ) on id_device
| extend Name = strcat('ðŸ“¦ ', id), Bytes = totalBytes, Id = id_device, ParentId = device;
// Gather total messages received.
let set3 = promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s == "edgehub_messages_received_total"
| where TimeGeneratedUtc_t > startTime
| extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags_s)
| extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
| extend id = trim_start(@"[^/]+/", tostring(dimensions.id))
| extend value = toint(Value_s)
| extend id_device = strcat(id,"+",device) 
| project id, device, id_device, value, TimeGeneratedUtc_t
| order by id_device, TimeGeneratedUtc_t
| serialize | extend nextValue = next(value, 1) | extend nextId = next(id_device, 1)
| extend diff = iff((value - nextValue) >= 0, value - nextValue, value)
| where id_device == nextId and diff >= 0
| summarize Messages = sum(diff) by id_device
| join kind=rightouter set2 on $left.id_device == $right.Id
| project Name, Messages, Bytes, Id, ParentId, Trend, device, totalBytes;
let set4 = set3 
| union (set3
    | summarize Bytes = sum(totalBytes) by Id = device
    | extend ParentId = '', Name = strcat('ðŸ’» ', Id)
    )
| project Name, Messages, Bytes, Id, ParentId, Trend;
let set5 = set4
| mv-expand with_itemindex=x Trend to typeof(long)
| summarize sum(Trend), Messages=sum(Messages) by  ParentId, x
| summarize Trend=make_list(sum_Trend) by ParentId, Messages
| join set4 on $left.ParentId == $right.Id
| extend ParentId = ''
| union set3
| extend AvgMsgSize = Bytes/Messages
| project Name, AvgMsgSize, Messages, Bytes, Id, ParentId, Trend
| order by Bytes desc;
set5
//{timeRange:end}
content.title: Messages received by IoT Edge Hub

content.query:
Alert
| project  TimeGenerated, AlertName, AlertSeverity, ResourceValue, LinkToSearchResults
content.title: Alerts

content.query:
let selRow = '{SelectedRow}';
let rowJson = parse_json(selRow);
let cap = extract_all(@"""Id"":\s*""([^""]+)", dynamic([1]), tostring(rowJson));
let deviceid = iff(rowJson.ParentId != "", rowJson.ParentId, cap[0]);
let data = promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s == "edgehub_messages_sent_total"
| extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags_s)
| extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
| where device  == deviceid
| extend target = strcat(deviceid, "/", trim_start(@"[^/]+/", extractjson("$.to", tostring(dimensions), typeof(string))))
| extend source = trim_start(@"[^/]+/", tostring(dimensions.from))
| extend messages = toint(Value_s)
| extend timeUtc = TimeGeneratedUtc_t
| extend sourceTarget = strcat(source,"+",target) 
| project  timeUtc, device, source, target, sourceTarget,  messages
| order by sourceTarget, timeUtc
| serialize | extend nextCount = next(messages, 1) | extend nextSourceTarget= next(sourceTarget, 1)
| extend diff = iff((messages - nextCount) >= 0, messages - nextCount, messages)
| where sourceTarget  == nextSourceTarget and diff >= 0
| project  timeUtc, device, source, target, sourceTarget, messages, diff;
let set1 = data
| summarize messageCount = sum(diff) by target, source, sourceTarget
| extend ParentId=target
| extend Id=sourceTarget
| extend Name=strcat('ðŸ“¦ ', source)
| project Name, Id, ParentId, target, source, messageCount;
let set2 = set1
| union (set1
    | summarize messageCount=sum(messageCount) by target
    | extend Id=target
    | extend Name=strcat('ðŸ“ž ', Id) 
    )
| project-away target, source
| order by messageCount;
let set3 = promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s == 'edgehub_message_send_duration_seconds'
| extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags_s)
| extend target = strcat(deviceid, "/", trim_start(@"[^/]+/", extractjson("$.to", tostring(dimensions), typeof(string))))
| extend source = trim_start(@"[^/]+/", tostring(dimensions.from))
| extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
| extend quantile = tostring(dimensions.quantile)
| where quantile == '0.9'
| where Value_s != 'NaN'
| where device == deviceid
| extend val = todouble(Value_s) 
| project TimeGeneratedUtc_t, target, source, val
| extend Id=strcat(source,"+",target)
| summarize P90Latency=percentile(val, 90)  by Id;
set2
| join kind=leftouter set3 on Id
| project-away Id1
| extend MsgRate = messageCount/(({timeRange:end}-{timeRange:start})/1s)
| project Name, Id, ParentId, messageCount, MsgRate, P90Latency
content.title: Messages routed by IoT Edge Hub for selected device

content.query:
let selRow = '{SelectedRow}';
let rowJson = parse_json(selRow);
let cap = extract_all(@"""Id"":\s*""([^""]+)", dynamic([1]), tostring(rowJson));
let deviceid = iff(rowJson.ParentId != "", rowJson.ParentId, cap[0]);
let data = promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s == "edgehub_messages_sent_total"
| extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags_s)
| extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
| where device  == deviceid
| extend target = trim_start(@"[^/]+/", extractjson("$.to", tostring(dimensions), typeof(string)))
| extend source = trim_start(@"[^/]+/", tostring(dimensions.from))
| extend messages = toint(Value_s)
| extend timeUtc = TimeGeneratedUtc_t
| extend sourceTarget = strcat(source,"+",target) 
| project  timeUtc, device, source, target, sourceTarget,  messages
| order by sourceTarget, timeUtc
| serialize | extend nextCount = next(messages, 1) | extend nextSourceTarget= next(sourceTarget, 1)
| extend diff = iff((messages - nextCount) >= 0, messages - nextCount, messages)
| where sourceTarget  == nextSourceTarget and diff >= 0
| project  timeUtc, device, source, target, sourceTarget, messages, diff;
data
| summarize messageCount = sum(diff) by source, target
| extend id = ''
| project id, source, target, messageCount
| union (data
    | sample-distinct 100 of source
    | extend id = source
    | union (data
        | sample-distinct 100 of target
        | extend  id = target)
    | sample-distinct 100 of id
    | project id);
content.title: Message flow graph
